title: F/S:  T3 Turkey Red Addie Joss SGC 70/5.5
author: jtschantz

posts.post_title: F/S:  T3 Turkey Red Addie Joss SGC 70/5.5
posts.post_content: I have for sale a T3 Turkey Red Joss SGC 70.  It is the highest rated Joss T3 on the SGC registry.  There is one Joss in a PSA 5.5 holder with none higher.  I am asking $2500 and can provide scans upon request.
Will also entertain trade offers in T3's for the Joss
wow. outstanding card. good luck with the sale.
